description: Security-focused VQA queries for threat assessment in home security monitoring

looking_at_camera.question: Is this person looking at the camera?
looking_at_camera.purpose: Detect awareness of surveillance - suspicious if avoiding or targeting cameras

face_covering.question: Is this person wearing a mask or face covering?

gloves.question: Is this person wearing gloves?
gloves.purpose: Detect fingerprint concealment - suspicious outside cold weather

bags_or_packages.question: Are there any bags or packages being carried?
bags_or_packages.purpose: Identify items that could be used to carry stolen goods or tools

crouching_or_hiding.question: Is this person crouching, hiding, or trying to stay out of view?
crouching_or_hiding.purpose: Detect evasive behavior indicating potential threat

interaction_with_property.question: Is this person interacting with doors, windows, or locks?

flashlight.question: Is this person carrying or using a flashlight?
flashlight.purpose: Suspicious at night - may indicate casing or break-in attempt

weapons_or_tools.question: Are there any weapons or tools visible?
weapons_or_tools.purpose: Identify potential break-in tools (crowbar, pry bar, etc.)

vehicle_running.question: Is there a vehicle with its engine running or lights on?

multiple_people.question: Are there multiple people in the scene?
multiple_people.purpose: Group activity may indicate coordinated threat

open_doors_windows.question: Are any doors or windows open or damaged?

license_plate_visible.question: Is the license plate visible and readable?
license_plate_visible.purpose: Hidden plates may indicate criminal intent

commercial_markings.question: Are there any company logos or commercial markings?
commercial_markings.purpose: Legitimate service vehicles have visible branding

vehicle_modifications.question: Does the vehicle have any unusual modifications or damage?
vehicle_modifications.purpose: May indicate stolen or frequently used for crimes

usage_notes: Questions are designed for Florence-2 VQA task format
Risk weights help prioritize alerts in the Nemotron risk assessment
Person queries should be applied to detected person bounding boxes
Scene queries should be applied to full frame analysis
Vehicle queries should be applied to detected vehicle bounding boxes
